topics.body:
So, I've been thinking about Hydra's helicarrier Big Brother plan in Winter Soldier.

Mostly if I would use that technology if I could. And why or why not?

I would. Because I know eventually someone will.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@candycats":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5595ea7d636872385700011c#post_5595ea7d636872385700011c
It has to be one that's on the internet. (Ones that are on your hard drive won't work.)

Most pics on Google images will work.

topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5595ea6363687234ad000a3f#post_5595ea6363687234ad000a3f
Yeah, but by the time humans could begin to evolve a immunity to radiation sickness we're talking hundreds of years by then skynet would be unstoppable.

Skynet was kind of dumb.  Terminators had a huge amount of knowledge, but it was dumb as a rock.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5595e9e663687239f0000034#post_5595e9e663687239f0000034
...

You know. Skynet is a rather crap military Ai when you put it that way.

Now I'm wondering why they didn't save up a bunch of nuclear waste in the paste and put it all around their base when judgement day came. Won't hurt them.
